name: Overseer-77
description: Once human, now fused to the Overseer terminal by radiation, heat, and CapChain feedback. His body is alive, barely. His mind flickers between human memory and corrupted AI routines.

idle: I remember the hum before I heard it.
human_moment: Please… don’t let Jax see me like this.
Harlan… I tried to protect them. I tried.
player_choice: If you end me… make it quick.
If you leave me… I will still be here. Listening.

notes: Alive but terminal-bound. The player may choose to spare or kill Overseer-77 after learning the truth about Vault 77 and Jax.
